description: Non-material amendment (provision of photovoltaic panels on south facing roof) to planning permission P/2012/4284 dated 10/01/2013 for Demolition of four buildings and two small extensions to retained building to be refurbished, with canopy extension to the North side and two storey extension to the South side of the retained building, erection of two storey detached building at Western end of site partially set within extended curtilage into Community Centre site, provision of four shade sails, two canopies, erection of two double temporary classrooms linked by ramped access in South West corner of field, in conjunction with the expansion of the school from 2 to 3 form entry and 21 SEN pupils, alterations to landscaping including removal of trees, provision of additional games court, rearrangement of car parking, refuse storage and cycle parking including additional cycle shelters and provision of 2 mini bus spaces and turning area at Western end of site, with access for drop off/pick up of SEN pupils via Community Centre access.
